title: Womens Dress V Neck

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Dresses > Casual

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress cute, comfortable, and of great quality, with one mentioning it hits right above the knee. The dress is flattering, with one customer noting it's particularly suitable for full-figured women, and they appreciate its vibrant color. The length receives mixed feedback - while some say it's long enough to cover the butt, others find it too short, especially for tall girls. The see-through aspect is also mixed, with some saying it's not see-through at all while others find it very see-through. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous & flattering
items.body: This dress is the best! So flattering, good quality, not too short. Itâ€™s great for weddings. Iâ€™ve worn it so many times now & I get so many compliments. Read more
items.author: Emma

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable ðŸŒ¹
items.body: A really cute and comfortable dress! The material (although a little thin on top) felt nice and is very vibrant and flowy. I wore this for an anniversary dinner and I felt very sexy yet comfy. I am 5â€™4 and 195lbs and the XL fit well, I might order a large and see how that fits in comparison since it is stretchy around the waist. Overall, definitely worth the money, I will be buying this in a few more colors. Read more
items.author: Angela Bird

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute!!!
items.body: Absolutely love this dress! Bought it for the Paul McCartney concert and it was so fun and colorful! True to size. True to picture. Flouncy half sleeves stay in place with elastic. Comfortable and fun! Love it! Read more
items.author: RC

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lovely dress
items.body: This is a beautiful dress and fit well on a large chested woman it ties at the bust so there is an opening underneath. It is lightweight and breathable be careful if caught in the wind, and had held up well when washing (in a laundry bag). For reference I wear a 38DDD or 40DD and am about 197lbs and 5'4" Read more
items.author: Tanya Hyatt

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Theme Dress
items.body: I got this dress for a Miami vice theme. The dress is true to size and is pretty comfortable with its flowing bottom. The colors are so bright and vibrant. The top is super cute with the bow detail in the middle. The dress quality is great and the material helps with breathing to keep you cool. Read more
items.author: Troy Tolar

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this!
items.body: The dress is super cute fits. Well, it's flowy, not too short, it's not through, the only issue I had are the sleeves but I have long arms so it's hard to find sleeves that are long enough for me. This dress worked well for my birthday dinner and I was very happy with it. Read more
items.author: Lizzie T

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Did not work for me
items.body: This was cute but did not work for me. I wanted to love it but did not fit correctly. The quality was good. Read more
items.author: Lauren Witt

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not as pictured but still cute
items.body: The color matches. Fit is flattering for the mid section. The top seems a little off. The V/ the part of the dress where it ties is not like it appears in the picture. It is not as low/deep as it appears in the picture. I'm a 38D and the girls fit in there just fine. I was hoping the V was sexier, but it's still cute. Also being 5'9" it is not too short! Sleeves are a little uncomfortable, but the rest of the dress is comfortable! Read more
items.author: Bee

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 3 Green, 3 Dark Green, 3 Purple, 3 Royal Blue, 3 Apricot, 4 Pink, 4 Red, 4 Green, 3 Blue, 3 Turquoise, 3 White, 3 Blue 3, 3 Pink 3, 3 Pink 4. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
